basics.name: Ioannis Canellos
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software developer specializing in all things cloud. Member of the Apache Software Foundation. Father.

work.summary: software development on fabric8 and fuse
highlights: engineered the kubernetes and docker java dsl
engineered the kubernetes pipeline plugin for jenkins
implemented the arquillian & cdi extensions for kubernetes
implemented kubernetes support for spring cloud

work.summary: Team Leader of the Fuse Fabric (currently known as Fabric8) project
highlights: Lead the Fuse Fabric team
Introduced integration with EC2 and Openstack
Engineered the HA Git Config Server and Datasore
Polished and improved the quality of the product

work.summary: Creator of the Curry Integration Platform
highlights: Engineered custom integrations with Global Mobile Operators
Participated in the analysis, design and first draft of MSP system
Formed and lead the integration team

work.summary: Software Development on ASystem 10 and Horizons Projects. Unix Administration
highlights: Software Development
Unix administration
Presentations and training
Committer on Apache Camel
Committer on Apache ServiceMix
Committer and PMC meber on Apache Curator
Committer and PMC meber on Apache Jclouds
Committer and PMC meber on Apache Karaf
Committer and PMC meber on Apache Gora

projects.name: Fabric8 Kubernetes Client for Java
projects.description: Java client framework for Kubernetes and Openshift.
highlights: The most widely used Kuberenetes client for Java

projects.name: Spring Cloud Kubernetes
highlights: Currently in incubating for Spring Cloud

projects.name: Sundrio
projects.description: Builder and DSL generator for Java.
highlights: Powers the Fabric8 project family

projects.name: Apache Karaf Cellar
projects.description: Distributed services, management and discovery for Apache Karaf
highlights: Backed by Hazelcast
Supports popular cloud providers

references.name: Spyros Magiatis
references.reference:
I had the chance to work with Ioannis for more than three years, while he was a Senior Java Developer in
the department that I manage at Upstream. He was the Irst member of the integration team where he
practically designed and implemented Upstream's messaging and billing gateway from scratch. After four
years this gateway is still Upstream's main integration solution; it has processed hundreds of millions of
transactions and a team of three people is working on extensions and improvements of a product, which
solid foundations have been set by Ioannis few years ago. This achievement alone states the obvious, that
Ioannis is a highly skilled professional, extremely productive and committed to his work.
